post:
I have an almost unused 4gb plan from openvzio for sale 

The original annual price is $93.6 (http://openvz.io/), mine had a recurring discount coupon that brought it down to 69.75/year. 

**This is by far the best high ram leb plan available in the market with excellent disk/network & support **, 3 vCores, 75 GB ssd cached disks, Incoming Bandwidth: Unmetered , Outgoing Bandwidth: 1000 GB . Selling it only because I am not using it at the moment.


**_Looking for a reasonable amount, bids start from $45. _**

Payment through verified paypal only (pm for details).


p.s. winner of the bid will be required to register an account at iniz.com, after payment confirmation I will submit a ticket requesting transfer of the vps to your account.
